inputs.name: analysis_type
inputs.label: Analysis Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Defines the type of assessment to run.  The 'full' runs both dynamic and static analyis tooling.  The 'static' option runs only static.

inputs.name: artifact_dir
inputs.label: Artifacts Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Defines the directory for nowsecure artifacts to be output to. In the case of the default assessment results would be `./artifacts/nowsecure/assessment.json`

inputs.name: binary_file
inputs.label: Binary File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Defines the filepath for the ipa / apk that is to be uploaded to run an assessments against.

inputs.name: group
inputs.label: Group
inputs.helpMarkDown: Defines the group reference that is used to trigger assessments.  Information on how to get the group reference can be found in the NowSecure Support Portal (support.nowsecure.com).

inputs.name: api_host
inputs.label: API Host
inputs.helpMarkDown: Defines the NowSecure base API to use.  This will not change unless you are leveraging a single tenant.

inputs.name: ui_host
inputs.label: UI Host
inputs.helpMarkDown: Defines the NowSecure base UI to use.  This will not change unless you are leveraging a single tenant.

inputs.name: log_level
inputs.label: Log Level
inputs.helpMarkDown: Defines the log level set for the NowSecure analysis task.

inputs.name: minimum_score
inputs.label: Minimum Score
inputs.helpMarkDown: Defines the score under which an assessment will fail.

inputs.name: nowsecure_ci_version
inputs.label: NowSecure CI Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Defines version of the underlying NowSecure binary to use.

inputs.name: polling_duration_minutes
inputs.label: Polling Duration
inputs.helpMarkDown: Defines the length of time (in minutes) to poll for an  assessment job completion.  The default for 'static' assessments is 30 minutes.  The default for 'full' assessments is 60 minutes.

inputs.name: token
inputs.label: Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Defines the token used to communicate with the nowsecure API.  This token should be stored as a secret.  Information on how to create a token can be found in the NowSecure Support Portal (http://support.nowsecure.com/).
